ItemTooltips.ghost: If you are having problems with right click carries
ItemTooltips.clarity: Clarity is required to gank or get lane kills early on. as venmous gale is an expensive level one skill
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: Always go for level 1 wards even if u have to buy both wards and courier. Contiune warding troughout the game, buy about 1 stack ever 6 min
ItemTooltips.courier: Always go for a courier if nobody else is getting it.
ItemTooltips.bracer: Venomancer is very squishy and bracers is a cheap effective way to get hit points. Skip this if you are doing very well
ItemTooltips.mekansm: A good item on venomancer if you can get it early enough (before 25 min)
ItemTooltips.flying_courier: Use your first 220 gold to upgrade courier if no one have already done so
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Good item if you get some early kills
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Late game hex is always good if you get enough farm
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Flat movement speed helps venomancers low base movement speed
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Can be used to land good ulties or simply counter heroes like ursa, riki or naix.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Good damage increase if you get early farm or kills
ItemTooltips.invis_sword: If you find it hard to land an ultimate force staff or blink dagger is better. Venomancer will not benefit from the damage and attack speed
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: If there is enough arcanes on the team tranquil or threads can be used instead.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Get if you already have bracers and nobody on the team have drums
ItemTooltips.smoke_of_deceit: Venomancer is an excellent ganker. Smoke is only needed in higher skilled games where people buy wards.
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: A good choice of you skipped the arcane boots and still need some extra hp. Can be very effective against enemies that can easily be kited
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: Late game survivability and good against right click carries. Disarm works even if target use bkb after being affected
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: Basi ring can be good in some situations, but get a bracer instead of the wraithband

AbilityTooltips.venomancer_venomous_gale: One of the best level one skills in the game'. Slow does not increase so it is ok to keep it at level one.
AbilityTooltips.venomancer_poison_sting: Great for harassment, skill one early level, two if the enemy team have templar assassin, as level one will not tick off refraction charges.
AbilityTooltips.venomancer_plague_ward: Great scouting tool, use all the time everywhere
AbilityTooltips.venomancer_poison_nova: Good ulti, hit as many as possible in a team fight and your job is done.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Sometimes stats can be leveled after wards instead of venomous gale and poison sting. Especially if you are struggling to stay alive.
